title: A4 Refill Notepad180-Pages – Premium 90 GSM Feint Ruled Paper with Margin – Hole Punched for Easy Filing – Smooth Writing No Ink Bleed – Ideal for Office School Business – Pack of 1/3/5 (3)
features: A4 Size (21 x 30 cm) : – Perfect for All Writing Needs This A4 refill pad lined is designed for school, office, and business use, providing ample space for notes, assignments, and projects
Premium 90 GSM Feint Ruled Paper :– No Ink Bleed Enjoy a smooth, high-quality writing experience with ink-resistant, thick 90 GSM paper that prevents smudging and feathering
Pre-Punched 4-Hole Design :– Ready for Filing Unlike standard note books A4, this file paper lined A4 comes pre-punched, making it binder-friendly and perfect for organized storage.
Feint Ruled with Margin :– Stay Organized The blue lined paper with a clear margin ensures structured and legible writing, ideal for students, professionals, and writers
Available in Multipacks :– Choose 1, 3, or 5 Whether you need a single refill pad or a notepads A4 multipack, this option saves you time and money by offering bulk packs

Ideal for Multiple Uses :– School, Office, and Business Works as a reporters notebook spiral, an Oxford campus refill pad, or an a4 lined exercise book, catering to diverse writing and note-taking needs
Sturdy Binding :– Pages Stay Secure Unlike flimsy refil pads this Oxford refill pad A4 alternative is built with strong, durable pages that won’t tear easily
Compatible with Multiple Writing Tools :- Use gel pens ballpoint pens highlighters and pencils without worrying about ink smudging or page tearing
Professional & Student-Friendly Design:- The pastel notepad design suits students professionals and creatives making it a versatile choice for all users
Lightweight & Portable :– Easy to Carry Whether for class work or home use this wide ruled refill pad A4 is lightweight and easy to transport
description: Product Description The Story Behind Office Zone Project Notebooks and Refill Pads: Designed for Everyday Excellence & Sustainability In a world where ideas shape the future, every note, sketch, and scribble holds the potential for something great. Whether it's a student's first attempt at solving an equation, a professional brainstorming their next big project, or a creative mind sketching out a dream, the Office Zone Notebook is designed to be more than just paper—it's a canvas for progress. But what if a notebook could do more than serve its purpose? What if it could be a responsible choice for the planet while delivering the best writing experience ? That’s exactly what inspired Office Zone to create this premium notebook series—combining functionality, durability, and sustainability in one beautifully crafted product. Office Zone Notebooks & Refill Pads – Smart, Durable, and EC0-Friendly Note-Taking Solutions Non-Ink Bleeding and Bloating Say goodbye to ink smudging, ghosting, or paper tearing ! Our 90 GSM high-quality pages ensure a smooth, clean writing experience with no ink bleeding through the paper—perfect for fountain pens, gel pens, and markers . Affordable and Long-Term Use – Size Comparison Maximize your note-taking potential with thicker, high-quality notebooks that last longer! Compared to standard notebooks, Office Zone Notepads (180 pages) and Spiral Notebooks (250 pages) provide more pages, more value, and more durability for everyday use. Easy to File – 4-hole pre-punched for binders or folders Keep your notes organized and secure with our pre-punched pages , designed to fit seamlessly into any 4-ring binder or folder . No more messy loose sheets—just structured and professional note-taking for students and office users alike. Made with 100% FSC-Certified, Recycled Paper The paper is made from recycled materials (e.g., 30-100% post-consumer waste). FSC-certified , it means the paper comes from responsibly managed forests Acid-Free & Chlorine-Free Paper Chlorine-based bleaching in paper production is harmful to water ecosystems . Acid-free paper ensures long-lasting, archival-quality pages Plastic-Free & degradable Packaging 100% Recyclable Materials . Soy-based inks for printing instead of petroleum-based inks EC0-Friendly Production Partner with One Tree Project, and Forest Reforestation Projects, or similar NGOs . Commit to planting a tree for every 10,000 notebooks sold . A Notebook That Cares for You & the Planet At Office Zone , we believe that small choices lead to a big impact. Our notebooks are made with FSC-certified, sustainably sourced paper , ensuring that every page you write on contributes to forest conservation efforts . Unlike traditional notebooks that contribute to deforestation and pollution, our acid-free, chlorine-free pages with long-lasting, ec-friendly writing surfaces . We’ve also taken a step further to eliminate plastic packaging , replacing it with degradable and recyclable materials . Because we know that every eco-conscious decision counts. We commit to planting a tree for every 10,000 notebooks sold More Than Just a Notebook – A Commitment to Sustainability For every notebook we create, we’re taking steps to reduce our carbon footprint. By partnering with responsible manufacturers , we ensure energy-efficient production and minimal waste . Plus, a portion of our proceeds contributes to tree-planting initiatives , because we believe in giving back to the planet that gives us so much. Every time you choose Office Zone , you're not just getting a notebook that lasts —you're making a responsible choice for a better future . Crafted for Quality & Performance For added convenience: We understand that a notebook is only as good as its paper. That’s why our 90 GSM high-quality pages provide an ultra-smooth writing experience— no ink bleeding, no ghosting, just crisp, clean writing . Whether you're using a gel pen, fountain pen, or pencil , each page is designed to keep your thoughts and ideas neat and legible. Micro-Perforated Pages (for the Spiral Notebook) – Easily tear out notes without damaging the pages. Pre-Punched Refill Notepad – Designed for seamless filing into ring binders. Integrated Ruler on the Cover – A small but practical tool for quick measurements on the go. Office Zone 250 Ruled Pages Notebook Premium 90gsm Quality Paper | Micro-Perf... A4 Refill Notepad180-Pages – Premium 90 GSM Feint Ruled Paper with Margin – H... Buying Options Buying Options Customer Reviews 2.0 out of 5 stars 1 — Page Count 250 Pages 180 Pages Paper Quality 90 GSM High-Quality Paper 90 GSM High-Quality Paper Size A4 Size A4 Size Binding Type Spiral Bound Refill Pad (No Binding) Perforated Pages Yes (Micro-Perforated) No Pre-Punched Holes Yes Yes Ruler Printed on Cover Yes Yes EC0-Friendly Packaging Yes (Plastic-Free) Yes (Plastic-Free) Best For Students, Professionals, Office Use Filing, Office Work, Notetaking Office Zone – Where Quality Meets Responsibility With our notebooks, you don’t have to compromise between premium quality and sustainability . Whether you're a student, a writer, a planner, or an innovator, your ideas deserve the best space to grow. And now, they can grow on pages that help protect the planet . So, what will your next page hold? O ffice Zone – Crafted for Your Thoughts, Designed for the Future.
